summary: This mod adds historically accurate and lore friendly Nordic armor to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8sk4S8M.png[/img]

Name: Norse Viking Armor II
Version: 2.5
Date: 1/28/2013
Category: Armour
Author: Croc

[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]This File cannot be used in any way shape or form as content for a paid mod.[/size][/color][/b]

Description
=======================================
This Armor pack includes historically accurate/lore friendly armor to the world of Tamriel.
Only the player can have certain armors but some bandits use, Many warriors in the history of Skyrim have worn maille such as this and found glory in Tamriel in life, and in Sovngarde after death.

Video
=======================================
[youtube]P1UdCv8AZJE[/youtube]


Details
=======================================
This armor set includes
1.Tunics made by combining the red/blue vanilla merchant tunic with leather at the tanning rack
2. Chainmail byrnie (short sleeves) made with steel smithing perk
3. Chainmail Hauberk (Long sleeves) made with advanced smithing perk
4. boots and gauntlets.
5. Helmets (nasal and Gjermundbu) Thanks to shingouki2002
6. Lamellar Armor (steel, leather) Thanks to TH3WICK3D1 and ActusReus
7. Leather tunics (under leather)
8. Heavy Helmets, Vendel from Nate Hallahan of Hammerwing Studios
=======================================

TERMS OF USAGE
=======================================
ASK FOR PERMISSION AND YOU SHALL HAVE IT.

History
=======================================
1/28/2013 Initial Release


Credits
=======================================
-Bethesda for their wonderful textures, models, and game.
-shingouki2002 for original helmet model
-Nate Hallahan of Hammerwing Studios for heavy helmet http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15521
www.hammerwingstudios.com
-TH3WICK3D1 for lamellar cuirass model
- ActusReus for lamellar and belt texture
- Skyrim Nexus for allowing me to release my mod on an open forum.
author: Croc
